public class SqliteUserDAO extends Object implements IUserDAO

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SqliteUserDAO()
    Constructs a new SQliteContactDAO with a connection to the SQLite database, and creates the users table if it does not exist.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String email, String password)
      Retrieves a user from the database based on the provided email and password.
      Specified by:
      getUser in interface IUserDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user to retrieve.
      password - The password of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A UserDetails object representing the retrieved user if found, or null if the user is not found or an error occurs.
